mapper.insert: insert into kanrisha values (#{kanrisha_uid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kanrisha_pw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kanrisha_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renraku_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renraku_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from kanrisha where kanrisha_uid = #{kanrisha_uid} and kanrisha_pw = #{kanrisha_pw}
